original: ** MAP BY HANNIBAL [SPA] (Rafuron) **
zh_trans: ** 地图制作 HANNIBAL [SPA] (Rafuron) **

original: ** Teleporting AFK to the cage in 30s **
zh_trans: ** 挂机玩家30秒后传送至尸笼 **

original: **Door will close in 30 s ** Get safe into Helms Deep!**
zh_trans: **大门30秒后关闭 ** 快进入圣盔谷!**

original: ** The door is closing in 10s **
zh_trans: ** 大门10秒后关闭 **

original: **Show them no mercy...**
zh_trans: **你对他们的仁慈...**

original: ** for you shall receive none!**
zh_trans: ** 就是对你自己的残忍！**

original: **Objective: people at wall MUST defend the wall**
zh_trans: **目标: 传送至城墙上的人类必须坚守城墙！**

original: **Objective: people at gate MUST defend the gate**
zh_trans: **目标: 传送至城墙上的人类必须坚守大门**

original: **Note: if you defend at defensive points you will earn 1 point every 10 seconds (near GATE and TOP of WALL)**
zh_trans: **提示: 如果你在防守点防守（大门和城墙），每防守10秒你会获得1分奖励**

original: **Note for ZOMBIES: if you set a ladder you will earn 1 point ** Same if you attack the gate**
zh_trans: **给僵尸的提示: 架设攻城梯或使用攻城锤破门，每一次均可获得1分奖励**

original: **You must not retrieve ** The retrieve will be announced **
zh_trans: ** 你不得撤退！ ** 需要撤退时会通知你！ **

original: ** Ladders! **
**Huge ladder is being setting!**
zh_trans: **攻城梯已部署完毕!**

original: **The battering ram is breaking the door!**
zh_trans: **攻城锤破门了！**

original: **Door is under attack!**
zh_trans: **大门正在受到攻击！**

original: **Main door cannot hold the battering ram! RETREAT NOW!**
zh_trans: **城门可能撑不住了！快撤退！**

original: **The door is now open Get in the fort now!**
zh_trans: **门开了！快进堡垒！**

original: ** They have broken through! The castle is breached! Retreat! Get them inside! Into the Keep!**
zh_trans: **他们已经突破了！城堡也被突破了！撤退！放他们进来！进要塞继续守！**

original: ** Get safe in the fort! **
zh_trans: ** 尽快撤入堡垒以确保安全 **

original: ** Defend at fort! Hall door will open in 40s!**
zh_trans: ** 守住堡垒！大厅门将在40秒后打开！**

original: **Hurry! get in the hall!**
zh_trans: ** 快！进大厅！**

original: **Resist 30s!**
**Kill the remaining zombies of the room!**
zh_trans: **杀死还在房间内的僵尸！**

original: **Sun is rising.**
zh_trans: **太阳已经升起……**

original: **Charge!**
**Charge! Follow the shiny path! Do not separate!
zh_trans: **大家聚在一起，跟随着圣光的指引发起冲锋！冲！！**

original: **A zombie has passed the WALL! Kill him or think about start a retreat!**
zh_trans: **僵尸已经爬上了城墙！杀了它们或者准备撤退！**

original: **A zombie has passed the GATE! Kill him or think about start a retreat!**
zh_trans: **僵尸已经冲破大门！ 杀了它们或考虑撤退！**

original: **The wall has been destroyed! Fall back! Get in the fortress!**
zh_trans: **城墙已经被破坏了！撤回！进到堡垒里来！**

original: ** Wall zone is out of control ** retreat NOW!**
zh_trans: ** 城墙区域已经失控！ ** 撤退！快！**

original: ** Gate zone is out of control ** retreat NOW!**
zh_trans: ** 城门区域已失控！ ** 快！撤退！**

original: **Fall back! Get in the fortress! Follow the shiny path**
zh_trans: **撤退！沿着圣光的指引进入堡垒！！**

original: **Horn activated ** Charge with unlimited ammo **
zh_trans: **号角已经吹响 ** 冲刺！！！ **
